website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic choice for those wanting a slimmer money clip wallet with enough room for daily cards and cash.
pros: Money clip is non-magnet for those worried about de-magnetized cards
Particularly slim despite heavy duty design
cons: Does not offer a window for ID
Money clip tends to scratch cards

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and is a very nice looking wallet. I have owned several Travando wallets and have have not found a better alternative to my needs. I have only had it for a few days and will see if it stands the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good low profile wallet
customer_reviews.text: After switching to this wallet, I stopped carrying a lot of the cards I didn’t really use regularly. Very happy and a lot easier on my posture when sitting with it in my back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Mamazonm

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, people tell me it looks nice, overall can't complain about the wallet, overall great piece. Solid build quality, faux leather, hopefully no puppies from leather farms in china suffered for good looking piece. Overall nice wallet, feels solid, will leave another review if any issues of build quality arise after the first year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Dubas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Slim Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I am a very particular when it comes to purchasing items that I use every day and this wallet fits the bill in every way shape and form. Looks, feels, and smells like real leather but it’s actually lighter and believe it or not seems more durable. Keeps money in the clip secure and tight as well as the cards. Slim enough to put in any pocket and looks very classy to boot. I have had multiple compliments on it already and that makes me even more confident in my purchase. $30 for a wallet isn’t necessarily cheap however it is worth every penny! Buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality for less than 1/2 the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the new wallet, it's a little larger than what I've carried in the past, but it's still slim and very manageable (I carry it in my front pocket, as I always have). But for organizing my credit cards, ID and other things, I haven't had one that is any better. I see nothing about this item that isn't well made and plan to have this around for a while. I really like the front cover, where it's really easy to access either a credit card or ID, with a simple push up. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking to buy a new wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J. Scott Jr.

customer_reviews.title: money clip too tight
customer_reviews.text: The money clip is too tight. I couldn’t fit more than a few bills If you are going for a money clip then why make it as big as a wallet? Neither there nor here. Also, would have really liked a transparent sleeve for the id Update: I really think this was a thoughtless design. With just a few bills added to the clip, I can no longer put credit cards in the sleeves. If I manage to shimmy it in, it is a struggle to get it back out.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Roger

customer_reviews.title: Very Big
customer_reviews.text: It's actually the biggest wallet I've owned. Looks small in the pics but it doesn't solve your problem if you dont want a bulky wallet. The card holders aren't great neither, if you have more than 2 cards in each pocket it's a hassle to get one out. Gave it two stars because it's made well and for the front pocket but it's not for me will replace soon.
customer_reviews.author: canelo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted something to hold my cards, and has a clip. I have had a couple of the front pocket wallets with a clip, but I have a hard time getting the cards out when I need them. This has an outer pocket, and its easy to pop my debit card out from the finger hole quickly. The inside color is different, but already had a compliment on it. It's okay, a bit orangy for me. I am old enough to remember when every wallet sold was made from decent feeling, real leather. This is not that. I believe this is all synthetic. All in all, it was inexpensive, and it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Look is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: This wallet seemed like a really good product but it isn't. I received it 3 days ago and the fabric is already cracking and ripping, the money clip makes it impossible for the cards to smoothly slide in and out of the pockets, and not to mention that it has begun to bend my cards on the opposite slots. The material on the inside parts of the card holders has stripped off and stuck to my cards. I would not recommend this product to other buyers. If you're looking for wallets with money clips, find ones that have the attachment on the outside and not the inside of the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Barrios

customer_reviews.title: Slim, thin, and shiny!
customer_reviews.text: I like how sleek and well made this wallet is and it sits very nicely in my back pocket and in my suit pocket. I honestly thought I left it at home because I couldn’t feel it in my pocket like I could with my tri-fold. Very happy with this wallet. Functional and minimalistic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slim wallet that grabs the attention.
customer_reviews.text: This an excellent slim style wallet for the price. The materials feel good and the design factor is great as well. I usually leave my phone, keys and wallet on my desk, and have gotten many compliments about this thing from my co-workers. This wallet easily fits 7 cards and some cash. I mostly just use 2 IDs, 1 credit card (front slot) and health insurance card, with other 3 slots for interchangeable cards (store specific and debit). This is a stylish wallet that's perfect for a guy with a minimalistic approach.
customer_reviews.author: Anomaly

customer_reviews.title: I like the wallet
customer_reviews.text: I like the wallet, but the credit card inserts are really tight which makes it difficult to use the cards, also cash keeps coming out from pin
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Pandya

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice wallet but has some big flaws. Had it 5 weeks and large chunks of the fake leather are coming off from the credit card slots. Some of it sticks to the cards also. The neat little emblem on the front of it is perfect for cracking a phone screen if you place your phone screen facing the emblem in the same pocket. Cards are difficult to get in and out of slots.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Clip came off within 5 days.
customer_reviews.text: Used for approximately 5 days before clip came off exposing the glue that was supposed to be holding it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: It's good but not for me
customer_reviews.text: The wallet looks nice on the screen but when I got it in person it looks and feels far less remarkable. The money clip holds tight. The pockets will need some stretching but they do their job. It feels very well made with cheap supplies. I like it but I would rather hold on to my old/current wallet. In comparison, my old wallet has more room for cards and such with a money clip on the outside. So, I couldn't replace my wallet since I wanted to carry more items (ID, CCW, credit cards, biz cards, store cards, and a micro SD card). I will probably give this to a kid for their first wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Phat Boy Elite

customer_reviews.title: Carbon
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my son for his field trip to Orlando I decided to keep it cuz it's really nice and I really love it. so I'm going to give him another one, this is a very nice slim wallet that I put in my front pocket and it does not bother me while I'm driving. Well worth the price. Came in a nice box. Totally recommend. Was still a great wallet. But it was stolen Saturday. Everything was in it. Clearly they liked it better than me. When i can afford it, I'll be replacing it again
customer_reviews.author: badazz68cobra

customer_reviews.title: Buyer's Remorse - Can I get a mulligan?
customer_reviews.text: The wallet works OK, but I'm quite underwhelmed with it. It's at least 50% bigger than it needs to be for cards to fit into the slots. The material feels REALLY cheap. And the money clip is too loose to properly hold bills in place. If I hadn't destroyed the packaging that it came in while trying to open it, I probably would have returned it. Really wish I would have purchased the same one I recently lost (Alpine Swiss). That one is twice as good for half the price (if only the magnet was slightly stronger on it).
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Skillz

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year Review
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wallet for a year now. I like the slimness and feel of it. Downside - If you have more than 3-4 bills in the note clip, you almost need plyers to pull out the cards that are behind it. If you want to put the card back in, you continuously have to pull your cash out, put the card back in, then the cash. The leather in the inside is already peeling as well. Overall the wallet is fine, but I'm already looking for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Money clip can't hold a thing
customer_reviews.text: it is an ok wallet. But I have to rate it low as the money clip end does not contact the wallet. There is about a 1/4 inch gap between the closest part of the clip to the wallet. Money simply falls out. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: S Skeate

customer_reviews.title: Quality But Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: The Wallet itself is a quality item but it’s a bit longer and wider that a traditional wallet making it awkward to hold and carry. Also the money clip makes it hard to put in and take out your card when you have money in it, in the slot that is behind it. Solution would be to make the wallet with two pockets instead of putting that upper third one and making it a little thinner there’s no need for the wide pocket most cards are 1in smaller on both sides than the pockets are. As for the money clip problem not sure hope you don’t carry to much cash.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Not much capacity. O.K. for short trips.
customer_reviews.text: Sloppy. The little logo wasn't aligned. The money clip was sewed in unaligned. For the price I would expect a little more attention to detail. The card holders are too tight and awkward. Getting a card out is a fight every time. The depth of the card holders makes it impossible to retrieve a card without a great deal of effort. Incredibly non ergonomic. Good idea. Good sales pitch. Badly designed. Badly constructed. I have been using mine for short trips. I realize it's a negative review. It's not a terrible gadget , just not what I was expecting from the ads and reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it at all
customer_reviews.text: This was not what was expected. Materials feel very cheap almost plasticy like a kids wallet. The thing I hated the most is how long it actually is. The money clip should be removable because it just makes the wallet feel thicker and it's annoying. I have always bought slim minimalist wallets and they save space by fitting cards almost exactly and going in your pocket easily. This thing is way longer than it needs to be , almost as long as my Galaxy S10. It is bulky in the pocket and I really just hated everything about this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but didn’t fit the bill
customer_reviews.text: While this is a nice product with good design and style it just didn’t fit all of my husbands credit cards and money he carries on a daily basis. I had been searching for a replacement to my husbands old leather money clip and thought after reading reviews this would be a good buy. I got it for him for Christmas and it’s March and he just finally admitted he had to switch back to his old one. This one was too tight he said. After putting his credit card into holder there was no room for carrying actual cash. Sorry this is my review because I was really hoping to have found a new money clip for him.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research prior to buying. My shopping experience lasted about 6mo prior to actually making the purchase. Upon receiving the wallet here is what I have to say: This is a very good little wallet for the money and is very high quality for what I paid. It’s very portable and has enough pouches to carry whatever I need. I ordered the BLUE/BLACK variant and it looks just like advertised. If I had to buy again TRAVANDO is easily my first consideration. I appreciate this company offering an inexpensive alternative to say a RIDGE wallet as that is a brand that’s not for me. If your like me and want a minimalist bi-fold.... look no further!
customer_reviews.author: beau Smith

customer_reviews.title: First Minimalist Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first minimalist wallet and this one is great. I currently carry six personal and business credit/debit cards, my driver's license, two insurance cards, two gift cards and it works great. I have never carried cash in my wallet, but have played around with this one and about 8 to 10 bills fit perfect for me along with the other items I carry and not overly cumbersome. The one thing I found with this and probably all minimalist wallets is that I was carrying too many items. Many that can be stored on my phone, so it also forced me to clean things up a bit. Good quality, looks and functions great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Grooms

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid wallet
customer_reviews.text: Thought to give this a try since the old wallet had to be retired. Simple design is nice and keeps you from putting all kinds of junk in it. Slim design and doesn't make for uncomfortable sitting either.When it comes to durability, it easily passes the test. Went scuba diving in the ocean and had forgot it was under my wetsuit after the long hike to the dive site. Soaked afterwards, so it was washed in the sink with dish soap and laid on the table to dry. That was months ago and it doesn't show wear or any signs of damage. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Relentless Pursuit

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I recently reset myself financially, getting rid of all of my credit cards and tons of reward program cards I never use. That left me with a thick wallet that was mostly empty. I never carry cash, so I decided to give this wallet a try as a slim option. I am very happy. My favorite feature is the outside slot for keeping my most used debit card handy for quick use at registers. I’d say my one wishList for this wallet would be a clear slot inside for holding my ID for quick showing as needed, but aside from that this is the perfect wallet for my needs, and it has nice style to it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very well done in a compact package
customer_reviews.text: I just received this wallet and it holds the cards very well, the money very well and is a very sharp looking wallet. One of the pockets I have a credit card, health card, vision card and insurance card and the wallet is not overflowing. Very well done and good for the price. Not geniune leather as it does not smell like it, made in china but all the packaging and text come in German/Advertisements are in german. I like this and if it holds up I will love it. The company begs for a good review in the inserts of the wallet so that warrants the 4 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Lasabar

customer_reviews.title: The Practical Buy but Missing the Money Clip Replaces the Money Opening
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews and rarely, contribute it's time to contribute to the community. This wallet is decent. It's reasonably made, it's somewhat inexpensive looking despite clean line stitch. The leather feels like pleather/sweaty/plastic-like. If you've been to a Ross this wouldn't meet their threshold of $19.99 (Forever 21 vibes, back in the 2000s a few uses/decent), it lacks the "finesse" its practical but not the look by my standards. The front side has an opening which is practical and the inside is great. However, not the money clip replaces the traditional money opening. Although the clip is tight it probably cant handle multiple receipts, cash, or cheques.

customer_reviews.title: seems like problems have been fixed
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I read all the bad comments about this wallet before buying it. Took a chance, and as far as I can tell, they fixed all the problems. The pockets being to tight is not true at all. The money clip aspect being to tight or too loose......come on people, it’s impossible to please everyone. I think it’s perfect. The feel and look of the wallet is on point. The only thing is that you might have to be gentle because the leather isn’t the strongest. I can see it getting wear pretty fast, but no different than most wallets.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist yet masculine beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent wallet with the money clip on the inside finally somebody who gets it it's a smaller company and so far they make premium products cuz this carbon fiber one that I've purchased is a beautiful wallet I haven't been able to test it for the NFC type problems I've been having with my debit card but the fact that I haven't had anyone steal my information yet means the wallet must be working I hope the whole thing is NFC protecting an RFID protecting but right now it's just in the front pocket. I highly recommend this beautiful wallet very minimal yet very masculine.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Zaniboni

customer_reviews.title: I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: at first, it was nice, nothing fancy. It came with a warrenty card your suppse to scan that never worked. Then one side of the walled credit card pockets dont go all the way though so you reall cannot put anything on that side. Lastly, when I gave up, the money clip part bent and not will not even hold 10 bills. Again, at first it was nice, but slowly fell into the "not a good buy"
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Schawang

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet if you like money clips
customer_reviews.text: This is certainly a good product. It's well made, quality materials. My own personal preference is that I really don't like the money clips idea. When you pay for something. you're always pulling out all the cash onto the counter, unfolding and sorting out your bills. Everyone can see you, and it's a mess. If you only carry a few dollars cash, and pay for everything with a card, then maybe this isn't a problem. So, good product, but they could have another version with a traditional billfold pocket. So now I'm looking to replace this wallet because I really don't like money clips.
customer_reviews.author: Seeeker

customer_reviews.title: NOT slim or small!
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a “slim” or “minimalist” front pocket wallet. It’s bigger than my old trifold wallet!!! It’s longer and just as thick as my trifold, even after removing 2 cards. I am trying to go smaller, not bigger, so I returned it. The quality is nice. Nice leather, well crafted and felt like it will last. I debated giving 2 starts because of the borderline false advertising however it is a well made wallet so that’s why 3 starts. Just don’t be fooled this wallet is not small.
customer_reviews.author: Brain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for bulky bifold and trifold wallets
customer_reviews.text: My husband carries his money and credit cards, etc in his front pants pockets. He has never used his back pockets to hold his money & other valuables. The old tri-fold and bi-fold wallets are too big and bulky to be carried in a front pocket, so for years hubby has used a small cut-out square from a file folder bound by masking tape to hold all his cards. When I saw this I had to buy it for him, and he is delighted with it. The style is very modern, and the materials are sturdy and good-looking. The money clip is an extra feature he loves. I feel more comfortable knowing his "wallet" isn't going to disintegrate!
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Might be good for you. Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking wallet. It definitely stays thin. It had some internal wear from the money clip after less than a month. After a couple of years, I'm sure it wouldnt look very good. I did really like the quick access pocket on the outside. I use my credit card for everything and pay it off every month so that was nice. I ended up returning it because it just wasnt what I needed. Might work for some people.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Allen

customer_reviews.title: what an upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice wallet at a very reasonable price. I go through wallets fairly quickly and I was hesitant to spend this much on what could have been a cheaply made one that would only last a few months but I am very pleased with this purchase. The wallet is nicely made, looks way more upscale than its price, and fits my cards and some bills very nicely with a slim profile that is comfortable in your pocket. I definitely recommend this wallet. Only time and use will tell if it can stand up to my use and last a while.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: My husband really likes his wallet
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a new wallet so bad but he couldn't really find one that he liked so he kept his old one for longer than he should have. For our anniversary I decided that he was going to get a new wallet if he liked it or not. I found the Travando wallet and after reading the reviews decided that I would give it a try and crossed my fingers that my husband would like it. He loves his new wallet. It is sturdy and very slim so it fits in his pocket so much better than his old bulky wallet. The outside pocket is secure and holds everything in place. We would recommend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, I got the carbon model, and I love it. I was able to completely do away with my tri-fold wallet. I can carry my primary credit card in the outside pocket. Inside, I have room for my drivers license, a second credit card, my VA I'd card, AAA card, insurance card, and business cards. Everything I need as well as plenty of cash. Now, instead of sitting on a bulky wallet, I can slip my "Rio" in my front pocket. Less bulk, more comfort, and easier access. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: G. Scotty Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality - Slightly Longer Than Desired
customer_reviews.text: I have always used a non-fold money clip and decided to use try the slip money clip wallet. While it definitely is thinner than a normal wallet (money clips still vastly slimmer), the added length of the design to make the fold smaller made this product more bulky than I would have wanted. Overall, it it a pretty good product. It seems to be pretty well constructed, but the space for the ID card also doesn't have a viewing slot. You have to pull the ID card out through a thumb push hole which I have found to be bothersome. I would say this just didn't fit my tastes more than the product was not overall "good."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded 100 Points for Style
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and stylish. Got couple compliments on this, people thought I spent a fortune on this but I didn’t. Price is beyond reasonable. The easy card access is nice with the nice little money clip. The only downside is the fact when you pull out cash, people will see how much you have, can be good & bad thing. Also if your one of those people who like to use a card to scan through places like trains, home, work, ETC, without removing the card and simply touching your wallet to the pad, this will not work because of the thickness regardless of where you place the card on the wallet. But still a great wallet, I don’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & small
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of the leather, or pleather...whatever....and also the slide up on the front pocket to get the license out easily. Not so sure about the folding of the bills to a money clip just yet....I guess that will have to grow on me. What this wallet does do for me, is it forces me to put away cards and junk that I don't need or use. Hence, my butt is not nearly as bulged as it was before...price was very reasonable for the quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roadie

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in my husband's pocket
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking for a wallet that wouldnt be too bulky in his pocket. He was sick of the traditional tri-fold wallet. So he went on a mission to find one that would be comfy on his behind. When he came across this wallet, it seemed to hit all the marks, so we purchased it. He is in love with it. It fits great in the pocket of his jeans and it actually holds quite a bit of things!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey-Rae

customer_reviews.title: Design not well thought out!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the wallet. It looks nice and is slim. It holds the cards I need and the bill clip is handy. What I don’t like is that when you flip it open, the card slots are upside down. The card slots should be the opposite orientation so that cards can be removed upward without having to flip the wallet over. To me, this is just poor planning on the part of whoever designed it or approved the production.
customer_reviews.author: LarryM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wallet with one design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet however it does have one major design flaw. It is very very difficult to insert credit cards into the sleeves on the side where the money clip is. The firm pressure of the clip with your money makes it nearly impossible to put credit cards in without removing money from your clip first. Obviously this not what one wants to do at a cash teller in a line of people. So what I do is place the least used cards in those sleeves. The wallet is firm and appears well made. I’ve been using it for 4 weeks and I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, slim billfold that feels nice and holds up over time
customer_reviews.text: It's held up well over time, including the money clip and the quality of the leather (not sure if real or not). Even when wet or very warm there is no wear and tear on the wallet. It always straightens my money to vending machine/ATM crispness and holds enough of my cards to be ideal. It doesn't hold as many cards as old-school wallets (hence the 4-stars vs 5) or have a plastic picture holder, but it does the job well as a slim and simple billfold. The pocket on the exterior provides easy access for a driver's license, which is quite handy in real world usage. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Money clip loses grip/tension after little use
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take more than 2 weeks of use and my money started falling out. The money clip loses it's spring tension after very little use, becoming worthless. Otherwise this wallet is designed design alright and the RFID protect on every pocket seems quality. They just need to make a better money clip holder with proper spring tension that doesn't easily bend out of shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Roozee

customer_reviews.title: nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: i don't carry a lot in my wallet, i like the fast access on top for regularly used card quick and easy to get my card out. the inside packets took a little more use, they are very tight and cards don't go in all the way but after about a week they loosened up, money clip is great and very secure. the wallet is not to bulky looks very elegant does great in front packet and inside packet of my jacket. one suggestion i would make is to have a little magnet to keep the ends together. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: alex sobol

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent packaging. Fits my cards with space. It is a bit longer, and wider than my last minimalist style wallet. My only critique of possible improvements would be give the opt-in of flipping the money clip to the outside of the wallet. The clip has the potential of bending or scratching cards. ** Update** The money clip started bending cards on the clip side. I fixed the issue but reversing the wallet. I'm sure with age there is potential for cats to fall out, but it is currently still tight enough to hold all the cards. Still very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the two-tone Black/Tan. Sure the wallet looked cool on Amazon but I wasn't sure what to expect regarding the quality of construction. Was delighted and surprised to find everything about this wallet surpassed my expectations. The leather is high-quality. The clip is high-quality and holds firm. Stitching looks well done. The size is perfect, it fits what I need but is low profile. And the emblem is very cool finishing touch as well. If you like what you see, buy it: Because $30 items rarely have this level of quality and design. I've received a few compliments about it already.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: All in all I'd buy one again!
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is very well made & attractive The card slots are sized perfectly; and cards & i.d. slide in & out with ease. The outside card slot is a great tool, as it keeps the most used card immediately at hand Before slimming down my wallet looked like an overstuffed, limp,New England football It is now neat & trim resting easy in my front pocket The weakest link is the money clip. It just takes some getting accustomed to, if you've never used a clip before All in all, I'd buy one again In fact, I did This is my 2nd one. Someone liked the first one so much they swiped it.
customer_reviews.author: Pappacucu

customer_reviews.title: A truly shamtastic experience!
customer_reviews.text: I love the self destructing features of this wallet! I've had it for 4 months and it already needs to be replaced after just sitting in my pocket most of the day. I'd recommend if you want a sort-of-"leather" wallet that has sparesly spaced metallic fibers for RF blocking, in need of a refresh every 6 months, then you have found your match!
customer_reviews.author: Electron Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that this wallet is smaller. This was a gift for my husband and he usually has bulky wallets and they tear faster than normal bc of the amount of things out inside. This wallet caused him to downsize tremendously and in my opinion it is more sleek, and professional looking. I was surprised the money clip was strong enough to hold money in its place, I was more concerned that it wouldn’t grip it as well and potential to fall out, but it doesn’t. The quality seems fairly strong, I would recommend and buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Harris

customer_reviews.title: This compact wallet is durable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have waited to write this review to see how it stands up to daily wear and tear, and this wallet is tough. I take my wallet in and out of my pocket a few times each day, and the corners have no sign of fade or wear. Since the Covid pandemic began i take precaution and clean my wallet each time i go to the store and use my debit card. The wallet looks good and stands up to cleaning with hand sanitizer and sometimes Lysol spray. I recommend this product to anyone needing a slim compact wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slim, Gorgeous and RFID Safe
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning to get an RFID wallet for 5 years but somehow never got around to it. I finally went looking On Amazon and selected this item. It is well stitched and clearly made to last. I was torn between the carbon wallet ( which I actually bought) and the black and white version. I am impressed enough by the wallets ' quality that I intend to buy the black and white as an alternate or backup. If you're looking for a beautiful wallet to protect your finances and identity you won't be disappointed by Travando.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet - nice design and very sleek. Not too expensive and good value. Reasons to buy would be something low profile with great origination. Id easily available on the front. You don't need 6 credit cards - so this wallet helps you prioritize what you really need to carry with you. Money clip is fixed and I'm used to being able to lift it for easier access. Not a big deal. Can be a bit hard to get the cards out at first, but not more than an extra second of effort. I'm not too picky - it's a great product. I'm sure they will continue to improve and hopefully this was helpful for them and you.
customer_reviews.author: webbtwin87

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well crafted wallet
customer_reviews.text: The wallet arrived within a few days of the order in perfect shape, looking exactly like the picture. When I loaded all of my ID and credit cards in it (11 pieces), it was slightly thicker than I was hoping but still quite slim. When I removed 5 that I didn't need regularly, it is extremely manageable. The leather and craftsmanship are incredible and even the money clip has a beautiful finish. Knowing that I can continue to put other cards back in if i decide I need them, this is an excellent value and beautiful piece which should last a long time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jules F in MN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, very well designed
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wallet. It holds many cards and has a separate outside pouch where you can put a couple of your most used cards. It's the first time I've had a wallet with a money clip and it's actually great! At first I was bundling up all the bills together but then realized it's easier if I bundle them by type, ie: $1, $5, $10 etc. By doing that it's much easier to grab what you need without everyone seeing you pull a big wad of cash out. All in all a great buy that I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Slim design, goood quality materials, sleek look
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after years of having (and loving) bulky-trifold-wallets, which I carried full of cards, and paper receipts, etc. in my back pocket, which is an absolute no no, stop carrying your wallet in the back pocket, specially if you spend most of the day sitting/driving it will mess your alignment (column/spine). Anyhow, I bought this after browsing extensively. Good quality materials, slim design as advertised, 6 card pockets just in case you need them, so far only using 3 of them. I feel a bit uneasy about the bill clip, but it does hold 3 folded bills solidly. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Francisco Partida

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a Quality Wallet.
customer_reviews.text: The whole wallet itself is amazing, I put in it about 8 cards. 10 bills and my ID card everything fit great and the wallet remained thin and compact. Now about the aesthetics of the wallet, it looks great with any style of wardrobe; looked great while I was wearing a suit and it looks great while wearing board shorts. Only thing I didn’t like was the absence of a ID slot, most compact wallets have one so that the ID card is visible without having to take out the card every time.
customer_reviews.author: " racsOcean"

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and material
customer_reviews.text: Just received this wallet last week. I was looking for a very slim (not necessarily folding) wallet, and this one seemed to look good. I got the black leather outside with blue dyed leather in the inside. I would not consider this a very slim wallet, though it is thinner than a normal one. I like how there is an outside card holder for one you would use often (ATM or such). I also like the slim money clip inside. Definitely tight enough to hold one or many bills. Overall, I really like the design and craftmanship. It looks more expensive that a $20 wallet. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it at all. Its way bigger than what I was expecting and is larger than my standard wallet. I thought it would be at least smaller and more compact than my regular wallet, but it is not at all. Thus, I am not using it at all and am deciding to save it as a gift to give later on. It gets 2 stars because the quality is good, but totally not what I wanted or what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly La

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design minimalist wallet
customer_reviews.text: Probably tried half dozen $30 range wallets on Amazon and this is prob my favorite so far especially in terms of quality, materials and design.... and thickness. Cash stays put in integrated money clip. Has 6 credit card slot but I double up a couple of them to hold more. Still deciding if i like the red orange colored interior edith the black exterior but not a deal breaker. Maybe I just got to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Review Noob

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a thinner wallet that would work for me. I have tried many and each have their limitations. This wallet seems to be the best option for me. It holds a lot of cards, but they are really tight. I am hoping that will loosen up a little but. Other than than, this wallet is great. It is thin, well built and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact, functional
customer_reviews.text: The first time that I've changed my type of wallet in 35 years. I'm very glad that I did! Over time, I have become more and more cashless in my purchases. More receipts have become electronic. And I was experiencing some back problems associated with the bulky, receipt-filled, card-laden wallet that I had been carrying. This is the perfect solution. This wallet has a small physical profile that I can fit in my front pocket. It's stylish looking and functional. I can carry a small bit of cash in the money clip and the most important of my id, credit, and debit cards. All that at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sleek.
customer_reviews.text: This money clip seems to do what it is intended to do. Kinda sad that those are the requirements for a good review, but here we are. I like the look of it. It has a small profile, so it is not uncomfortable to sit on. Easy to store away in small pockets. I enjoy the idea of the RFID blocking, but I have no way, personally, of verifying that. Nice to believe in though. In short, I would recommend the purchase of this money clip.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J. E.

customer_reviews.title: Great option for a thin wallet
customer_reviews.text: So far, this wallet appears good. Only time will tell how well it holds up. What I like: Hold 7 credit cards that are magnetically shielded. Material is high quality and the wallet is thin. What I don't like: Everything is tight, hard to extract Credit cards. My guess is that with use, the pockets will loosen. Overall, I'm satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BobG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and holds enough card
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is solidly constructed and hold cash well and cards well. It is compact enough and not too bulky in my pocket. I was concerned the money clip would make the profile too thick but it works fine. I have ten cards in it now and would say it probably maxes out at 2 cards per slot. The leather is smooth. I've carried it in my front and back pockets with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Oleary

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute gift for your partner♥️
customer_reviews.text: Omg so cute and so like sexy look when my man use it. quality is freaking amazing. The feel of it very nice and luxury feel. My boyfriend loves it♥️ what they say on the video and description is facts. Can fit anything and its easy access to take out your card and has a protection so theft cant hack it or anything. Nice for gift for your partner👍🏼👍🏼♥️
customer_reviews.author: Margie Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Its ok. I wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet about 5 months ago and after using it since then, i would NOT recommend this product. The key irritant for me is the clip. I don't know why the design has it more on one side rather than in the middle (where the fold is). I really dont know how to align the currency notes to the clip. Should the notes be in the center of the wallet or folder 1/3rd of the way which makes the currency notes start to fly away
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet as one of my husband's Christmas gifts. He needed a wallet so bad, so I let him open it early. He loved this wallet so much that he told me to get on Amazon and write a review! It is good very good quality for the price. It was much more than I was expecting. I told my husband how much it was, and he said he would have thought that it was much more. It is very functional, yet slim. I highly recommend this wallet for anyone. I'm assuming women can use this too.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel Wheatfall

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning. High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is impeccable. The stitching, color, and design are flawless. The exterior card pocket is a nice touch also! High Quality at a great price. I bought this as a gift and I’m sure they will love this wallet too. 1 Year & 7 Month Update: My fiancé absolutely loved this wallet! It was his favorite gift of all that day. He’s had it since 2018 but he lost it recently so I got him another! This wallet is amazing and worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: @CeymiChic💕

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: 1/13/20 The only issue I have with mine is that the money clip was very slightly off from being squared. The card slots are a snug fit. Overall I find this wallet to be a great buy, and would happily purchase another one when the time comes. **UPDATE** 3/7/20 Wallet is holding up great still looks new. The money clip feels a tiny bit lose, this could be do to materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jomar

customer_reviews.title: Needs revision.
customer_reviews.text: We will see. 3-4 things would make this very good. The back of the money clip should be on top of the cards. The number of cards under the clip are restricted by the clip's pressure. The card slots should both be opened at the ends of the wallet. The openings in the center are difficult to access. Placing 3-4 slots on one side and the clip on the opposite side would have solved those problems. Lastly, possibly having a snap or two closure on the end to secure any paper stored by some money. I'm currently trying to stretch the pockets some to accommodate more than the six or eight cards. The clip restricts the same side pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is outstanding better quality then ever seen before
customer_reviews.text: This company is like a expensive bmw it really makes its products perfect and beautiful we have all had normal wallets and been happy with either a cheap wallet or a expensive real leather one but never have I had a wallet this nice looking the presentation of the wallet was fantastic and the quality being amazing as said before this wallet is for the poor and the rich the bad and the good it’s great for all people and I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fat, back pocket, poke ya in the butt wallets are antiquated. I’ve been using smaller front pocket wallets for several years. The problem I’ve experienced is poor quality and deficient durability. The wallets simply didn’t last. My first impression of the quality of this wallet is positive, however time will tell. I do like the feel of this wallet; it’s well made. I’ll need more time to give a more thoughtful review.
customer_reviews.author: CBM

customer_reviews.title: Should of known.
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever carry this wallet and after 6 months of extremely light use it is falling apart. It’s apparent now very thin vinyl material wrapped around some cardboard isn’t going to make a good wallet. I’ll be going back to the old trusty “genuine leather” trifold. This wallet isn’t as thin as you would think either due to the thick metal money clip that is going to bend all of your cards.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: The best wallet I've bought in years
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is very compact, and able to hold over 10 credit card type pieces in the wallet. I love the money clip, hasn't worn through the fabric of the wallet. You can pack a lot into the wallet and it holds it shape. The money clip is sturdy and holds a lot of bills. Just the right wallet for today's man.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Simplify your wallet wearing and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I had to put my normal credit capacity on a diet and it was worth it. I like this sturdy wallet and it's small size. It fits very comfortable in a front or back pocket. I dropped down to seven cards + ID. It works for me and my lifestyle and I think fewer jeans will have that wallet square mark going forward. ;)
customer_reviews.author: ChristopherC71

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product.  Well constructed.  Great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Well constructed with nice stitching and material. Getting the cards in and out is a little tough but that may get easier after use. This is wallet is thinner and a touch longer than a typical wallet but it is more comfortable to carry in a pocket. As a frequent flyer having a wallet with RFID to protect my identity is a great. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rockford

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Wallet feals of high quality. It's a bit larger than what I had for the past 8 or so years. I don't use a standard wallet so this is nice and I keep it in my front pocket. It's nice that the money clip is inside. The credit card holders are a bit tight. But that's good in a way as they will never fall out. I think it will last for a while. I seen it was designed in Germany but unfortunately made in China. But I'm satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Z

customer_reviews.title: Slim wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love the wallet. There is a problem with me and that is I have carpal tunnel in both hands so it’s not very easy to pull my cards out. This wallet is for the young people or people that don’t have carpal tunnel or pain in there hands. So I hope the vender can remake this wallet a little easier for people who have pain in the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Gwboats

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made and Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: I've rarely used a money clip over my life and have always had a wallet. I dislike thick wallets in my front pocket so was wondering if this combination might be the answer. It is! It's a clever design, holds plenty of cards, and I find the quick access outside card slot to be very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: I don' recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I am still using the wallet today and has no sign of wear and tear, so it lasts. The wallet is actually appears "cheap". Depending on how many cards you have in the wallet, it may hold on to the money well, or the clip would be too small for the amount of cash you put in it. It not the worst thing but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It's been great.
customer_reviews.text: It took a few weeks for it to loosen up. It's a small pain if you want to carry around a lot of money. But you make it work. It's nice and small. I carry it in the front pockets. So it looks maybe more like a phone then a wallet. So makes it less of a target. I really like the id holder in the front great for when you have to show your id all the time. Without having to show your money.
customer_reviews.author: Hester FM

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: We ended up returning this after opening it for three reasons: 1. Wasn't crazy about the carbon fiber color. I think the black and orange would probably look better. 2. The wallet was just a liiittle bit bigger than expected. 3. While the packaging was nice, overall the quality didn't seem all that great. Plus, the logo was stitched on crooked!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet, needs just one change (IMO)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wallet. Works well in the front pocket. I only have one complaint. The "favorite" card pocket should be turned around as I think most people will put the wallet in their pocket with the fold side down. While the outside pocket has a nice tight fit, I think turning the pocket around so the opening faces up while in the pocket would make it perfect. The quality is great, and I like that it is very thin. I would buy another wallet from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Dan O

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but clearly some QC issues...
customer_reviews.text: I generally was pleased with the design of the wallet, But one quality control issues do it out on the example that I received. be stainless money clip was about 10 out of square with the rest of the wallet. Makes what appears to be a very well constructed wallet look shoddy unfortunately. trying to decide if I want to go to the trouble of a return or not.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Slim, sturdy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Slim, good quality, durable. For people that don't carry a LOT of cash, the money clip is a bit loose, and if you fill all the slots on the side with the money clip, the cards are difficult to remove. In the picture I attached my Fisher space pen to the money clip which is very helpful. Overall, I like it but it would be nice if the interior of the pockets had slick nylon or some mechanism to remove the cards easier.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but too bulky for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I gave this four stars because it is a nice looking money clip wallet, but it was too bulky for what I am looking for so I returned it. When I purchase a money clip its to avoid a bulky wallet. If you are okay with something approaching the feel of a more traditional wallet in your back pocket then I think this is a fine wallet. I also found the clip to be cumbersome. I did look nice though.
customer_reviews.author: systematical

customer_reviews.title: RFID blocking works
customer_reviews.text: The pockets are still a little tight, but I can fit two credit cards in each slot, so you should have plenty of room RFID blocking does actually work. I have a swipe badge for work with a chip that I careen just tap and go, and I have to take it completely out of the wallet in order to gain access to my building, even if I put it under the money clip with the wallet open. Even the outside pocket blocks the reader.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Is it really going to protect my credit cards for the future?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for protection and I only had this for a couple of weeks so I don't know if it really works. It is well constructed, slim and well thought out. When I have had this for a few years I will be able to tell you how it has held up to the its construction etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Important to understand about card access and speed.
customer_reviews.text: Cards are actually really hard to pull out. The stickiness of the leather makes it needlessly challenging. I'm sure all tight leather card holders are basically the same problem. But because of the vertical position, which looks great, it makes more surface area for the card to get stuck. I personally would not buy this again because of that, and I'd try and find a different style or design to make it easier to get my cards out when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: JoinBECU

customer_reviews.title: My search may be over!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried at least 6 different wallets in as many months in search of on that worked for me. I’ve tried so many minimalist and traditional style wallets just couldn’t find one that worked for me. I think my search is over. Though it’s a bit larger than I’m used to carrying, it still is fine for front pocket carry. It is very well made, and looks great with more carrying capacity than I need. I’ll update this review if I have issues, but for now, 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: packalaky

customer_reviews.title: Front pocket wallet
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wallet for a couple days now uts a good product. The quality is better than I expected. Enough space to fit most of your credit cards and driver's license. You can slide a few business cards in the wallet but once you get your cards your driver's license and little bit of cash on the money clip you start to run out of room for business cards but overall very happy with product it's great in the front pocket! I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: JAMES T KIRK

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet, but could be more durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet, but doesn’t hold up to a brute like me. I love this wallet! It has plenty of space for everything I need to carry and looks great. The leather began to tear open at the stitching after about a year & 9 months. One month later the material separated far enough that I now worry something may fall out. Wish it was more durable, but still a great wallet for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome L.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Stylish Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice wallet with six slots inside for cards, and a quick access slot on the outside for a drivers license. When folded it’s about 1/2” thick and isn’t something you’ll notice if in a back pocket. The card slots are nice and secure so I have no concerns about something sliding out. The money clip fits bills folded in half and is tight enough that even a single bill won’t fall out. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Stolen Credit card info
customer_reviews.text: My credit card was scanned today and thieves stole over 3K from the front card pocket of the wallet. Move it if you have it there move it ASAP!!!!! Don't let this scare you, it is an awesome wallet that has lasted my for the past 4 year with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this wallet and I do like the carbon fiber fabric. The slots for the cards are a bit snug but I can overlook that. The overall size seems sleek enough to fit into your casual jean pocket or blazer inner pocket. Money clip appears durable, might put a few dollars in it later on to test it out. Fits most of my cards and my drivers license conveniently. Overall, it seems like a solid all around wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Terrance

customer_reviews.title: Terrible...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible.. Yes it looks nice and great upfront. I had gotten compliments about it. But my issue is trying to take out my cards from the wallet it’s a crazy hassle, that has me fidgeting trying to get it out to much work is put into trying to take out your card. The quick slot in the front of the wallet also is difficult at sliding up and taking out your cards. I like quickly accessible things.. this is not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

product_meta.title: TRAVANDO Money Clip Wallet"RIO" - Mens Wallets slim Front Pocket RFID Blocking Card Holder Minimalist Mini Bifold Gift Box
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.65 x 2.95 x 0.63 inches; 2.12 Ounces
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :October 11, 2017
 * ASIN :B07BWBQ66J

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #1,168 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #4 inMen's Wallets 
    *  #338 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars11,489 ratings
feature_bullets: 𝗙𝗨𝗡𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟 & 𝗦𝗟𝗜𝗠 – Travando’s Wallet offers 7 card pockets The slim wallet is ideal for carrying business cards, credit and debit cards, bills etc.. The outside notch allows you to push out the cards easily
𝗜𝗡𝗗𝗨𝗦𝗧𝗥𝗬-𝗧𝗘𝗦𝗧𝗘𝗗 𝗦𝗘𝗖𝗨𝗥𝗜𝗧𝗬 - Tested by an independent German quality control institute. Our wallets block the 13.56 MHz band and protect against data theft by RFID scanners.
𝗜𝗡𝗧𝗘𝗚𝗥𝗔𝗧𝗘𝗗 𝗠𝗢𝗡𝗘𝗬 𝗖𝗟𝗜𝗣 - The metal money clip allows you to clip several bills inside your wallet
𝗥𝗘𝗙𝗜𝗡𝗘𝗗 & 𝗦𝗧𝗬𝗟𝗜𝗦𝗛 - Designed in Germany to best combine elegance, quality and convenience.
𝗦𝗟𝗜𝗠 𝗗𝗢𝗪𝗡 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗣𝗢𝗖𝗞𝗘𝗧 – We kept the dimensions of our slim wallet to 4.7” x 3.0” x 0.7”. It will fit in your pocket perfectly without bulging out
